note: Your character has a weakness, an Achilles heel. You can roll or choose from a table in the full game, choose freely, or use these examples from the Quickstart.

examples.name: Fainthearted
examples.description: You always stay at the back of the group.

examples.name: Bigoted
examples.description: Nightkin such as orcs and goblins are evil and need to be fought.

examples.name: Foolhardy
examples.description: You always go first into danger.

examples.name: Reckless
examples.description: You always take big risks without thought of the consequences.

examples.name: Gluttonous
examples.description: You take every chance you get to eat something tasty.

generic_weakness_roll_table_reference: The PDF mentions 'You can roll or choose from the table below or choose your weakness freely'. However, no table is provided in the Quickstart PDF itself, implying it's in the full core game.
